settings.worldName: String: Visible name of the world.
settings.worldDescription: String: Visible description of the world.

generationAxes.primary: String: Defines what the primary axe represents when generating biomes (e.g. 'TEMPERATURE', 'WEALTH', 'CORRUPTION').
generationAxes.secondary: String: Defines what the secondary axe represents when generating biomes (e.g. 'HUMIDITY', 'CRIME RATE', 'TECHNOLOGY').

biomes.biomeName: String: Visible name of this biome.
biomes.biomeDescription: String: Visible description of this biome.
biomes.biomeType: String: Generation type of this biome. Must be one of: 'REGION' (base layer), 'ABOVE' (rarer, sits on top of 'REGION').

generationAxes.primary: Number (0.0 to 1.0): The ideal value on the Primary Axis for this biome.
generationAxes.secondary: Number (0.0 to 1.0): The ideal value on the Secondary Axis for this biome.

biomes.rarity: Number: 0.5 (very common) to 0.99 (extremely rare). Only used for 'ABOVE' biome type.

visuals.groundColor: String: Hex color (#rrggbb) for the floor/terrain in this biome.
visuals.groundNoiseIntensity: Number: Defines how noisy the ground looks in this biome. Must be from 0.01 (smooth/flat) to 0.2 (very noisy/rocky).

props.texture: String: Defines the appearance of the prop. Must be in OBJECTS LIBRARY
props.density: Number: Density of this prop in each chunk. Must be between 0.01 (1%) and 1.0 (100%)
